entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
